byline.original: By G.H. ARCHAMBAULT Wireless to THE NEW YORK TIMES

abstract: Vichy Govt releases news of J Chiappe's death; London reaction
snippet: VICHY, France, Nov. 30--Three days after the event, the French Government today released the news that Jean Chiappe, recently appointed High Commissioner in Syria, "met his death" while flying to Beirut....

keywords.name: glocations
keywords.value: MEDITERRANEAN, AFRICA AND NEAR EAST AREAS

headline.main: DEATH OF CHIAPPE IN PLANE REVEALED; Vichy Charges French Envoy's Craft Was Shot Down by British in Naval Battle DATA FURNISHED BY ROME Italians Say Machine Flew Into Barrage of Mediterranean Conflict Off Sardinia

lead_paragraph: VICHY, France, Nov. 30--Three days after the event, the French Government today released the news that Jean Chiappe, recently appointed High Commissioner in Syria, "met his death" while flying to Beirut.
